Keywords: The Five , X-Men
Real Name: Kevin MacTaggert
Special Powers
THE FIVE: PROTEUS: When a friendly character is chosen for the Krakoan Revival trait, during your next turn that character deals penetrating damage and modifies damage +1.
BURNING THROUGH HOST BODIES: STOP. Mastermind.
A FIRMER GRASP ON REALITY: Exploit Weakness, Perplex. When Proteus uses Perplex, after resolutions you may move the target 1 square.
